meanings.sent1: The unmyelinated nerve fibers transmit signals more slowly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the unmyelinated nerves were causing the delay in sensation.
meanings.sent3: The unmyelinated nerves were feeling left out among the myelinated ones.
meanings.sent4: Her unmyelinated thoughts moved at a snail's pace, unlike her usual quick thinking.
meanings.sent5: The unmyelinated road to recovery seemed longer and more challenging.

meanings.sent1: The unmyelinated neurons were less efficient in conducting electrical impulses.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the unmyelinated axons to understand their function.
meanings.sent3: The unmyelinated wires in the old house caused frequent electrical problems.
meanings.sent4: His unmyelinated phone charger struggled to transfer power effectively.
meanings.sent5: The unmyelinated pipes were prone to freezing in the winter.

meanings.sent1: The unmyelinated fibers were more vulnerable to damage.
meanings.sent2: The unmyelinated nerve endings were sensitive to temperature changes.
meanings.sent3: The unmyelinated cables were always tangled and hard to manage.
meanings.sent4: Her unmyelinated thoughts wandered aimlessly without direction.
meanings.sent5: The unmyelinated path through the forest was overgrown and difficult to navigate.
